meanings.definition: Giggliest: superlative form of giggly, characterized by frequent or uncontrollable giggling
meanings.sent1: The children in the comedy show were the giggliest audience members, laughing at every joke.
meanings.sent2: She is the giggliest person I know, always finding humor in everything.
meanings.sent3: The giggliest puppy in the litter kept wagging its tail at the smallest things.
meanings.sent4: Her giggliest personality shone through even in the most serious situations.
meanings.sent5: The giggliest sound of laughter filled the room, spreading joy to everyone present.

meanings.definition: Giggliest: most giggly or prone to giggling
meanings.sent1: Among all her friends, Sarah is the giggliest, often bursting into laughter at the slightest joke.
meanings.sent2: The giggliest girl in class couldn't stop laughing during the funny movie.
meanings.sent3: The giggliest kitten in the shelter quickly won the hearts of the visitors with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: His giggliest nature made him the life of the party, spreading happiness wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The giggliest atmosphere at the comedy club made it the perfect place for a night out with friends.
